website_summaries.verdict: For use with European vehicles such as those made by Audi, VW, and Porsche, this antifreeze features a high customer satisfaction rating.
pros: OAT engine coolant works to protect aluminum
Available as either a 50/50 premix or a concentrate
Free from nitrate, amine, and phosphate
cons: Limited application in that it is recommended for foreign vehicles requiring OAT engine coolant

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered!! Glad I was able to find a 50/50 mix. This will now be my go to! 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Rho Main

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be the same as OEM
customer_reviews.text: If buying this know that you can get the full strength instead of the 50/50 for only $3 more. If I had seen that I would have bought the full instead of the pre-mix. You get more for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Myridge

customer_reviews.title: 2010 VW recommended antifreeze - Get the PINK!
customer_reviews.text: As a VW owner, ensuring you have the proper liquids and levels is likely priority #1.\ I researched the Sh!+ out of antifreeze and the Recochem OEM Extended Life ranked highly on most consumer reviews. Get the pink! This color is easy to distinguish from your other fluids in case of a leak. Zero cooling issues, car runs like a dream 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our 2015 VW Golf TDI!
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I own a 2015 Volkswagen Golf TDI SEL; I panicked when the engine coolant light went off out of the blue, and I was too scared to drive it to the dealership, and then get ripped off on top of that...I'm so glad I did my research, found this awesome product. I love that I was able to order this with amazon prime, instead of having to pay $20 in shipping fees like I've seen on other sites. So far so good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HurricaneJax13

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my Jetta. Had to replace the coolant because it had been mixed in the past and was starting to look/smell weird. This product is the right match for my vehicle and makes it run just fine if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Emig_96

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is concentrated. One gallon of concentrate makes two gallons of mix.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Much better price than some of the competitors an it's a premium product
customer_reviews.author: sarmatt

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the correct Coolant for Audi/VW G12 (red) systems excellent price for two gallons of mixed coolant
customer_reviews.author: Vanguard

customer_reviews.title: Quality Coolant for a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This coolant is great. European coolant is normally ridiculously expensive but this was a great value for the money. It works well in my car and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Working Great in 2013 Passat TDI SE
customer_reviews.text: Working great after about a thousand miles after a waterpump/timing belt kit replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Buy this locally and you're going to spend twice as much. Excellent product for the money

customer_reviews.text: It's the right stuff for my 15 jeep renegade but I still wound up grabbing a bottle from the dealership as well.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my car and the price was ok!

customer_reviews.title: VW coolant
customer_reviews.text: Own a VW. Needed this special coolant. Good price. Full strength. Not pre-diluted.
customer_reviews.author: curt

product_meta.title: OEM Recochem 86-324POEMVW-4PK Pink Premium Antifreeze 50/50 Extended Life-Euro II Pink
product_meta.description: Style:50/50 pre-mix| Size:1 gallonOEM Extended Life EURO II Antifreeze/Coolant meets or exceeds performance requirements of ASTM D3306, BS6580 and VW TL 774F. It is recommended for use in Audi, VW, Porsche and other newer model foreign cars and light duty gasoline or diesel engine vehicles requiring a nitrite, amine and phosphate (NAP) free, OAT engine coolant. This ethylene glycol based antifreeze/ coolant uses Hybrid Organic Acid Technology (HOAT) to provide extended protection against rust, corrosion and pitting caused by cavitation for all coolant system metals, including aluminum. When added as an initial fill and properly maintained in accordance with engine manufacturer's maintenance recommendation, this coolant will provide up to 250,000 km or 5 years of service life protection in automotive applications. For best results, do not mix with conventional high pH, phosphate, borate or silicate based antifreeze/coolant.
feature_bullets: Application: Newer model foreign cars and light duty gasoline or diesel engine vehicles and recommended for: Audi, VW, Porsche
Features: Low silicate OAT. Nitrite, amine & phosphate (NAP) free. Aluminum compatible.
Meets or exceeds performance requirements of: ASTM D3306; BS6580; VW TL 774F
Recommended change interval: 250,000 km or 5 years service protection

Provides excellent coolant-to-coolant compatibility with all coolant technology, however for best results, do not mix with conventional high pH, phosphate, borate or silicate based antifreeze/coolant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars216 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
